Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following parameters:** - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0203, 0.0] **Next, create the 2D sketch on the plane defined by the coordinate system with the following components:** 1. **Face 1:** - **Loop 1:** - **Line 1:** Start Point = [0.0, 0.0], End Point = [0.4459, 0.0] - **Line 2:** Start Point = [0.4459, 0.0], End Point = [0.4459, 0.75] - **Line 3:** Start Point = [0.4459, 0.75], End Point = [0.0, 0.75] - **Line 4:** Start Point = [0.0, 0.75], End Point = [0.0, 0.0] - **Loop 2:** - **Line 1:** Start Point = [0.1926, 0.2939], End Point = [0.2534, 0.2939] - **Line 2:** Start Point = [0.2534, 0.2939], End Point = [0.2534, 0.4561] - **Line 3:** Start Point = [0.2534, 0.4561], End Point = [0.1926, 0.4561] - **Line 4:** Start Point = [0.1926, 0.4561], End Point = [0.1926, 0.2939] - **Loop 3:** - **Circle 1:** Center = [0.223, 0.1723], Radius = 0.0152 - **Loop 4:** - **Circle 1:** Center = [0.223, 0.5777], Radius = 0.0152 **Note that Loop 3 and Loop 4 are circles which represent a central rectangular hole in the metal plate.** **Then, transform the 2D sketch into a 3D Sketch and Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75 using the sketch_scale parameter. Proceed to Extrude the scaled 2D sketch to generate a 3D solid model with the following parameters:** - Extrude Depth Towards Normal: 0.0101 - Extrude Depth Opposite Normal: 0.0101 - Sketch Scale: 0.75 - Operation: Create a new solid body. **The resulting CAD model will have the following dimensions:** - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.0203 - Height: 0.75</description>

{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0203,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.4459,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.4459,0.0],"End Point":[0.4459,0.75]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.4459,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.75]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}},"loop_2":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.1926,0.2939],"End Point":[0.2534,0.2939]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.2534,0.2939],"End Point":[0.2534,0.4561]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.2534,0.4561],"End Point":[0.1926,0.4561]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.1926,0.4561],"End Point":[0.1926,0.2939]}},"loop_3":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.223,0.1723],"Radius":0.0152}},"loop_4":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.223,0.5777],"Radius":0.0152}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.0101,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0101,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
